entries.content:
Analyzing test-mcp-client.ts for ultra-modular refactoring. File is 179 lines with multiple concerns:
- Test orchestration (main function)
- Console output formatting (repeated console.log patterns)
- Two separate test scenarios (basic + filesystem)
- Mixed test assertions and setup logic
- No test result tracking or structured output
- Duplicate logger/service initialization between tests
- Console formatting repeated throughout

This fits our ultra-modular pattern perfectly - extract formatters, test runners, result collectors, and assertion helpers.
